content.question: Which of the following scientific claims about the bond in the molecular compound <math alttext="H F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>HF</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is most likely to be true?

choices.label: There is a partial negative charge on the <math alttext="H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> atom.

Electrons are shared equally between the <math alttext="H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> atoms.
